scripts.test-unit: ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test -R dot -r test/_globals --check-leaks --recursive --grep Mock --invert 2>&1 | grep -v 'ERR!'; npm run-script cov-unit &> /dev/null
scripts.test-mocks: ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test -R dot -r test/_globals-mocks --check-leaks --recursive --grep Mock 2>&1 | grep -v 'ERR!'; npm run-script cov-mocks &> /dev/null
scripts.test: echo '\033[2A\033[K\033[A\033[K\033[A\033[K\033[3;36mUnit testing...\033[2;37m'; npm run-script test-unit; echo '\033[3;36mUnit testing mocks...\033[2;37m'; npm run-script test-mocks
